plot: Laure, 15 years old, believes that her father is responsible for the accident in which her mother was killed. When he is going to sell her mother's motorbike, she runs away with her brother...
title: La moto de ma mère
plot_es: Laure, 15 years old, believes that her father is responsible for the accident in which her mother was killed. When he is going to sell her mother's motorbike, she runs away with her brother...
plot_en: Laure, 15 years old, believes that her father is responsible for the accident in which her mother was killed. When he is going to sell her mother's motorbike, she runs away with her brother...
